about.description:
Finkraft
TechStars Foundercon Exclusive Perk | Learn More
Finkraft is a leading technology company specializing in automating complex accounting processes, reducing costs, and ensuring compliance.
about.highlights:
$25m in annual savings extracted from unstructured data. Imagine how much money are you losing?
Learn how Finkraft solved travel linked GST Input challenges for the world’s 6th largest IT services firm.
about.mission: Automate complex accounting processes and reduce costs
about.services: Finkraft helps enterprises achieve invoice data extraction & validation, and GST input claim compliances at scale.
about.issue: Poor compliance with invoice handling processes are the single largest driver of tax disputes and litigation for Indian enterprises.
about.solutions: Our cutting-edge tech solutions aid finance teams to automate compliance critical processes delivering immediate monetary saving and long-term compliance safeguards.
about.marketReach: 15% of India’s largest corporations use Finkraft GST & Recon solutions
about.work doing: Finkraft helps enterprises achieve invoice data extraction & validation, and GST input claim compliances at scale
about.about: FinKraft crafts reliable automated solutions to make complex business processes easier.

solutions.overview: Finkraft offers a range of solutions for various industries and processes.

benefits.maximizeSavings: Achieve up to 100% eligible Input Tax claims with our automated invoice processing and exception handling suite.
benefits.automatedCompliance: Automate financial compliances involving AP processes including reconciliations and document verification and validation.
benefits.actionableInsights: Finkraft's solutions empower finance, procurement, and sales leaders with critical insights required for identifying high-risk vendors and buyers, making timely interventions.

compliance.overview: Finkraft ensures compliance with complex financial regulations through advanced technology solutions.
benefits: Reduce tax disputes and litigation risks

resources.overview: Finkraft provides a wealth of resources to help businesses understand and leverage their solutions.
caseStudies: Learn how Finkraft solved travel linked GST Input challenges for the world’s 6th largest IT services firm.
resources.offices: Finkraft has offices worldwide to support global operations.
resources.careers: Explore career opportunities at Finkraft to be part of a dynamic and innovative team.

contact.overview: Get in touch with Finkraft to learn more about their solutions and services.
contact.cta: Every enterprise has unique challenges and requirements. Arrange a call to find out how we can help automate your specific accounting processes.

demo.overview: Schedule a demo to see Finkraft's solutions in action.
details: $25m in annual savings extracted from unstructured data.
Learn how Finkraft solved travel linked GST Input challenges for the world’s 6th largest IT services firm.
demo.cta: Imagine how much money you are losing. Speak to our experts to find out how we can help automate your accounting processes.

legal.consentText: By clicking "Accept All Cookies" you agree to the storing of necessary cookies to enhance navigation and to make our site work. We also set optional analytics cookies (including third party cookies) to help us improve the site and enhance your user experience by analysing your usage of the site.
